backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage mixins and extensive type definitions for sessions, documents, messages, images, files, and related request/response structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purposes, behaviors, and responsibilities across the app.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan outlining detailed steps and expected results for player document image/file uploads and related error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying shared base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point initializing theme from localStorage and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling identity login, profile setup, session restoration, routing, and global preference-based UI scaling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a recovery UI with reload and clear-data options.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Channel chat interface handling message sending, roll commands, image uploads, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders a single chat message with avatar, reply preview, long-press detection, and user profile resolution.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add/delete functionality, error handling, and identity-based permissions.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses document text to render inline file markers, showing images or downloadable file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Full document editor supporting content editing, file uploads, image insertion, autosave state, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Provides a dialog for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title, handling errors and upload state.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Implements a full editor for player documents with saving, visibility controls, file uploads, image insertion, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Renders a user avatar that shows an image or fallback initials with configurable sizes and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages uploading, displaying, and removing the user's profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/QuickCha: Dialog for setting a temporary display name and avatar for quick chat sessions, supporting image upload and local storage.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Handles creating, renaming, and deleting session channels through dialogs with validation and backend calls.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: UI dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking session-level documents using actor calls.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Provides session export and import controls with file handling, confirmation, and error states.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting member channels via session data mutations.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Manages creation, renaming, deletion, and visibility of player-owned documents through dedicated hooks.
Displays a list of player documents, allows selection, and opens a dialog to create new ones.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog UI for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting session documents using related hooks. Manages modal states, validation, and calls onSelectDocument after creation.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar for navigating channels and member channels with collapse control, profile access, and UI scale settings. Includes dialogs for channel management and quick profile editing.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings page for theme, background image, nickname, and session template management. Handles template import/clear, preference updates, and full settings reset.
frontend/src/components/settings/UIScale: Popover for adjusting UI scale via slider or numeric input. Updates preferences and provides a reset-to-default option.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals in milliseconds for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider for loading, updating, saving, and resetting user preferences. Applies theme changes to the document and exposes a hook for access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating a backend actor based on authentication and refreshing dependent queries on change. Initializes access control when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and updating document comments via the backend actor. Automatically refreshes queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, and uploading document file references using the backend actor. Validates document ID and invalidates queries after uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Provides hooks to list document images and add images to session or player documents, invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Defines hooks to query and mutate player-owned documents, including listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and visibility changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Implements a polling hook that repeatedly runs a callback at a set interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the preferences context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickChatProfile.t: Manages loading, saving, and clearing a locally stored quick chat profile with internal state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Fetches and polls session data including session details, channels, member channels, and messages, plus mutations for member channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Provides hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, and deleting session documents with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a userâ€™s display name with fallback to truncated principal formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Handles fetching and updating user profiles for the caller or other principals, including profile picture removal.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, chat utilities, and layout/scrolling rules.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific app localStorage keys and all sessionStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes file marker tags within text content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes image marker tags within text content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user UI preferences with validation and clamping for scale values.
frontend/src/lib/quickChatProfileStorage: Handles loading, saving, validating, and clearing a quick chat profile stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Performs basic validation on dice roll command patterns and returns validity results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and validates JSON export/import files for session data.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears minimal session context data in localStorage.
Manages saving, loading, clearing, and validating reusable session templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable time or date/time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements the lobby UI for hosting or joining sessions, including template application and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Renders the main session interface with channels, documents, messaging, and view selection logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing feature requirements, and pending requests for a quick chat profile feature using local device storage.
